holidays.title: National Brothers and Sisters Day
holidays.description: Brothers and sisters know you like no one else ever will.

holidays.title: Baby Day
holidays.description: Baby Day acknowledges the many joys and challenges that come with having a baby.

holidays.title: Brothers and Sisters Day
holidays.description: Older or younger, our siblings are our very first friends and enemies. Celebrate your bonds today!

holidays.title: Childhood Depression Awareness Day
holidays.description: Failing to provide appropriate and substantial mental health services puts the lives of kids at risk.

holidays.title: International Harry Potter Day
holidays.description: Grab your wand and let’s revel in the magical history of Harry Potter.

holidays.title: International Scurvy Awareness Day
holidays.description: From the era of pirates to a modern problem, here’s what you need to know about scurvy.

holidays.title: National Byron Day
holidays.description: Relax and read on as we reveal fascinating facts and figures about your favorite Byron.

holidays.title: National Foster Care Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the people who make the foster care system work for children in need.

holidays.title: National Life Insurance Day
holidays.description: Join us as we discover how the idea of securing the future started.

holidays.title: National Play Your Ukulele Day
holidays.description: A favorite among musicians, National Play Your Ukulele Day is the day of the ukulele.

holidays.title: National Sandra Day
holidays.description: Want your child to be successful? Here is a name that may propel her to greatness.

holidays.title: National Truffle Day
holidays.description: A fabulous holiday guaranteed to tickle your taste buds and provide a culinary delight!

holidays.title: Poem on Your Pillow Day
holidays.description: Celebrate Poem on Your Pillow Day by slipping a poem onto a loved one’s pillow.

holidays.title: Polish National Flag Day
holidays.description: “Na Zdrowie” — cheers to a new day and a new flag! It’s Polish National Flag Day.

holidays.title: Take a Baby to Lunch Day
holidays.description: It’s time to take a brand new (tiny) partner for lunch!

holidays.title: National Teacher Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Help your teachers sit back, relax, and shine even brighter on their special day.

holidays.title: The Twelfth Day of Ridvan
holidays.description: The Twelfth Day of Ridvan celebrates Bahá'u'llah's departure for Constantinople and his new revelation.

holidays.title: World Asthma Day
holidays.description: Wear a gray ribbon, and let’s help and support people suffering from Asthma.

holidays.title: World Tuna Day
holidays.description: World Tuna Day is the perfect time to understand that tuna is delicious, but not infinite.

holidays.title: BamBam’s Birthday
holidays.description: With his exceptional skills, this ‘Thailand prince’ has risen to the throne of his kingdom.

holidays.title: Black Smurf’s Birthday
holidays.description: Black Smurf is so talented, and we can't wait to see what he does next.

holidays.title: Dwayne Johnson’s Birthday
holidays.description: He may be tough as a “Rock,” but this successful actor has a soft, kind heart.
